posts.post_content:
T206 Collector here- found the T218 and love the set. Interested in getting some raw cards of any the runners- particularly the marathoners. Let me know if you have any for sale. Looking for maybe 2-3 to get my feet wet as a lot or 1 of the marathoners.

Thanks!

Just browsing the threads and saw your post. I am breaking up my T218 set and haven't posted any of the track stars yet. If you have an interest in any particular one let me know, I can look at what I have left tonight. I have a good amount of them raw, also have a few PSA graded.
Do you have one what is condition?
The T218s are a fabulous set, such a depth of track and field athletes, a diversity of sports, nice pictures and a realistic change to complete the set. Good luck with your collection!

Hey Matt!

i've got some lower condition runners/athletes for sale $10 each PPFF preferred mailed PWE.  let me know which subject you are interested in and I can send better photos.  thanks!  Cliff
